Note.Content: MT NJPS "declare" | RSV NRSV ESV "grasp" NIV "grasping" REB "pick up" GNT CEV "hold"

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= action by which humans speak written words aloud
literally: to be called (by name); hence: = state in which humans have a high reputation which results in their names being pronounced on a regular basis
literally: to be called; hence: = state in which a person is known with certain characteristics and treated as such
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities make a public announcement
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
literally: to call, summon; hence: = causative action by which deities cause certain things to happen, ◄ as if they were people that were summoned
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place
literally: (one's) name is called (over someone); hence: = state in which a person or building is closely associate to another person or a deity
literally: to call on (someone's) name; hence: = action by which humans acknowledge a deity and are willing to live in accordance with some of the requirements of that deity
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which a community selects leader by calling out their name
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
literally: to meet; hence: = process by which a certain event starts affecting someone
literally: to cause to meet; hence: = causative process by which a deity causes a certain event to start affecting someone
literally: to meet; hence: = process by which a certain event starts taking place
= state in which humans happen to be in a certain place
literally: to meet; hence: = action by which humans are actively looking around for certain things to happen
literally: to meet; hence: = state in which two inanimate objects are located in a certain place facing one another
